snippet: Twenty-two militants at a training session were killed after a commander mistakenly used an armed belt during a demonstration.
abstract: Twenty-two Islamic State of Iraq and Syria militants die in Iraq when a commander demonstrating suicide bombs unwittingly uses a belt packed with explosives.

byline.original: By DURAID ADNAN and TIM ARANGO
byline.contributor: Duraid Adnan reported from Baghdad, and Tim Arango from Istanbul. Christine Hauser contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Twenty-two militants at a training session were killed after a commander mistakenly used an armed belt during a demonstration.

headline.main: Suicide Bomb Trainer in Iraq Accidentally Blows Up His Class
headline.print_headline: Suicide Bomb Trainer in Iraq Accidentally Blows Up His Class

keywords.value: Islamic State of Iraq and Syria
keywords.name: organizations
